data.title: Drillbit Taylor
data.meta_description: Drillbit Taylor is the deuteragonist of the 2008 film Zoolander and its 2016 sequel, Zoolander 2. He is a world-famous male model turned secret agent who helps his former rival, Derek Zoolander, fight terrorists masquerading as fashionistas. He is portrayed by Owen Wilson, who also portrayed...
data.text:
Drillbit Taylor is the deuteragonist of the 2008 film Zoolander and its 2016 sequel, Zoolander 2. He is a world-famous male model turned secret agent who helps his former rival, Derek Zoolander, fight terrorists masquerading as fashionistas.

He is portrayed by Owen Wilson, who also portrayed Lightning McQueen in Cars, Marmaduke in Marmaduke, Jedediah Smith in Night at the Museum, and Reggie in Free Birds.

Personality[]

Drillbit Taylor is portrayed by Owen Wilson who has played Mobius M. Mobius in Loki (2021) and many other films,

Drillbit is a kind-heart who helps Wade Ryan, and Emmit from Terry Filkins who is bullying them constantly and won't stop,

So they hired him as their bodyguard to protect them from Filkins and Ronnie.

Biography[]

Drillbit Taylor is first shown waking up at his homeless place then he takes a shower on the beach, then is shown where the officers and him are having a confirmation about what he can't have,

Then Drillbit is shown with his homeless friends playing a bet and Drillbit gives a musician money then he says he wants to go to Canada, then his friends told him he wanted to go to Iceland but he changed his mind,

then Three boys Wade, Ryan and Emmit look for a bodyguard to keep them safe from Filkins and Ronnie then Drillbit finds a bodyguard meeting, in the cafe

Drillbit meets them at the cafe but they ask how is he legit, Drillbit says he protected Three Vice President, Bobby Brown Sylvester Stallone and he makes up military stuff to them, then they go to Wade's house to pick up stuff but Drillbit lies to them saying it for a weapon,

then the Wade, Ryan and Emmit pays Drillbit 500$ dollars to kick Terry's ass but he fails as if he scared of Filkins then the next day Drillbit teaches them how to kick Filkins ass and then he tries to spar with them but they all fail,

Then he saves them by putting the fire on a student's project making a water hose go on and then the Three Boys congratulate Drillbit for saving them,

Then on Drillbit's birthday he makes out with Lisa Zachey who is attracted to him and wants to go on a date with him then he takes her out on a Romantic Date for her then he is shown taking a shower on the beach and is witnessed by Ronnie and his mom,

Then Ronnie tells Filkins about what happened then Filkins and Ronnie confront Drillbit about being a fraud and a homeless bum Drillbit tries to defend himself but ends getting punched by Filkins,

Then Drillbit goes to nurse's office to fix his nose then he goes to Wade, Ryan and Emmit then they try to tell him why didn't he kicked Terry's ass then Drillbit answers by telling them that he doesn't like violence, and if the Principal found out he was not a real teacher,

Then he would get arrested and sent to jail and Drillbit says he is like the man jumping in the front of the President and he wanted Wade, Ryan and Emmit get away without any injuries then the three boys apologize to Drillbit then they go to Wade's house to get a bowl of cereal but they see Drillbit's homeless friends stealing Wade's stuff then Don punches Drillbit saying that how you Billy-Jack somebody's ass,

Then Wade gets angry so he kicks Drillbit out of his house then Drillbit tells the three boys that his real name is Bob Taylor, but his finger got cut off by a Drillbit in high school and everyone started saying that making fun of him, then they asked him if he was in the army for real then answers yes but Wade admits that Drillbit was in his house to take all of his stuff and money to go to Canada,

Then Wade yells at him to leave and he leaves then he talks to Lisa on the phone saying he is not a real teacher or a doctor then Drillbit wolfs out in the woods, Drillbit gets a walkie talkie call from Wade, Ryan and Emmit saying that they want all of their stuff back and they calling on the police on him then Drillbit realizes what he has done and wants to make things right so he goes into the truck,

To get all of Wade's stuff back to his house, then he brings it back to his house before his parents ever come to the house, then Emmit says Drillbit must've put it back but Wade's stepdad hears it and asks Wade what's going on then they come to visit the Principal who tells them that the police are after Drillbit, Then Drillbit wins the lottery wanting to go to Canada but he changes his mind,

Then he returns the Silver Platter he borrowed from Wade then he is shocked to hear that they are going to Terry's house to fight him and Ronnie then as the group are being attacked by Filkins and Ronnie, Drillbit shows up there throwing a hat at Filkins then tells Ronnie to let Wade go then Drillbit tells the party people that's party over go home, then Drillbit says to Filkins that he is a young man and has a crazy look in his eye and it's really freaking him out right now,

Then Filkins Punches Drillbit 3 times Ryan asks Drillbit to kick Terry's ass but Drillbit says he can't he is a minor then a party person says Terry's not a minor he's 18 then Drillbit finds out he is 18, Drillbit gets angry and starts beating up Filkins and defeating him, With Terry defeated he throws a sword at Wade, Ryan and Emmit, but Drillbit catches it losing one of his pinky, then going to the hospital and jail,

a few weeks later Drillbit writes a note to the three boys saying thank you for the Cap'n Crunch and saying the Filkins is shipped off to Hong Kong for Underage drinking and breaking laws then Drillbit says They can do whatever they want in high school since Filkins is gone then he gets out of prison he sees the three boys and Lisa and he is excited to see them again and Ryan asks Drillbit if he got shanked in Jail, then he says he learned language and learns that abierto is open in Spanish, then the movie ends.
